verbs.description: reform to [V: aid] [ARG1: child sexual abuse victims] comes down to senate last day the state senate is poised to reconvene on wednesday for its last scheduled session day and is expected to tackle the statute of limitations reform bill senate pennsylvania senate joe scarnati republican party united states jim vansickle president berks county pennsylvania sexual abuse united states senate pennsylvania state senate diocese of erie pennsylvania child sexual abuse berks county rep mark rozzi joseph b scarnati rep mark rozzi gop david poulson
